full_summary:
# CADIA - Adobe Experience Managers Project

## Overview
The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) invites bids from qualified contractors for a project to enhance their digital experience in managing content across different platforms. This requirement is open to TBIPS Supply Arrangement Holders who have been certified under Tier 1 for services in the National Capital Region.

## Project Details
- **Project Title:** CADIA Project - Adobe Experience Managers
- **Reference Number:** PW-23-01025424
- **Solicitation Number:** 2023-00967B
- **Publication Date:** February 14, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date:** March 22, 2023, at 3:00 PM Eastern Time
- **Expected Contract Start Date:** Not specified
- **Expected Contract End Date:** Not specified
- **Tender Status:** Expired

## Project Requirements
A team of one (1) Level 3 Applications/Software Architect and one (1) Level 3 Programmer/Analyst will be required to deliver the project. The team will leverage the CFIA's existing infrastructure and capabilities in Arc Geographical Information System, Dynamics 365 (D-365), and Adobe Experience Manager (AEM). The project aims to enhance the CFIA's digital experience in managing content across different platforms, utilizing AEM as a broad digital experience management solution.

## Technical Requirements
- **Applications/Software Architect:** Responsible for leading the development team and collaborating with CFIA Subject Matter Experts to deliver functional requirements to the AEM Platform.
- **Programmer/Analyst:** Assisted in the design, development, and testing of software solutions.

## Contact Information
Lisowski, Alexander
alexander.lisowski@inspection.gc.ca

## Attachments
For more information, download the tender document in English or French from [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/14/bd432d4d4f3b37471335039b7bb06486/2023-00967_npp_en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/14/bd432d4d4f3b37471335039b7bb06486/2023-00967_npp_en.pdf) and [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/14/29e3e47eda15f0
